common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: Use this Open API to get vehicle list by brand, model, year, and version.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

To inform compatibility list, can be equal to Brand, Model, Year, or Version.


Pass the compatibility_details=\"Brand\" to get all brand list;

Pass the compatibility_details=\"Model\" and brand_id=1234 to get all model list under brand_id=1234;

Pass the compatibility_details=\"Year\" and brand_id=1234 and model_id=2345 to get all year list under brand_id=1234 and model_id=2345;

Pass the compatibility_details=\"Version\" and brand_id=1234 and model_id=2345 and year_id=3456 to get all version list under brand_id=1234 and model_id=2345 and year_id=3456.

","name":"compatibility_details","sample":"Brand","type":"string","required":"True","key":"XzYNZzC"},{"description":"

ID of the brand.

","name":"brand_id","sample":"1234","type":"int64","required":"False","key":"mhSQQWm"},{"description":"

ID of the model.

","name":"model_id","sample":"2345","type":"int64","required":"False","key":"NtJMpRi"},{"description":"

ID of the year.

","name":"year_id","sample":"3456","type":"int64","required":"False","key":"dZDWCdc"},{"description":"

If language is not uploaded, the default language=en, the following are the languages supported by different markets SG: en ; MY: en / ms-my / zh-hans ; TH: en / th ; VN: en / vi ; PH: en ; TW: en / zh-hant ; ID: en / id ; BR: en / pt-br ; MX: en / es-mx ; CO: en/es-CO ; CL: en/es-CL. Note: For markets that have already launched global tree, Crossboard shop only support returning en and zh-hans language data.

","name":"language","sample":"pt-br","type":"string","required":"False","key":"PjNeKBS"}],"response_params":[{"name":"error","type":"string","sample":"","description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","key":"KZRHNFJ"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"MTPGCxC"},{"description":"

Indicate waring details if hit waring. Empty if no waring happened.

","name":"warning","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"cRpFxp"},{"description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking

","name":"request_id","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"QryBjss"},{"description":"","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"TMFszji","children":[{"description":"","name":"vehicle_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"jpwbKZj","children":[{"description":"

ID of the brand.

","name":"brand_id","sample":"1234","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"GmRcbN"},{"description":"

Name of the brand.

","name":"brand_name","sample":"Toyota","type":"string","required":null,"key":"WEjcHBB"},{"description":"

ID of the model.

","name":"model_id","sample":"2345","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"GmXXjZJ"},{"description":"

Name of the model.

","name":"model_name","sample":"Etios","type":"string","required":null,"key":"nktRaRB"},{"description":"

ID of the year.

","name":"year_id","sample":"3456","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"xwdCdZm"},{"description":"

Name of the year.

","name":"year_name","sample":"2023","type":"string","required":null,"key":"asWHxWp"},{"description":"

ID of the version.

","name":"version_id","sample":"4567","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"RKFEX"},{"description":"

Name of the version.

","name":"version_name","sample":"1.0","type":"string","required":null,"key":"YsQtCJN"}]}]}]}
